<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs=""
>
[Blasting Beams](/Feats.aspx?ID=3780) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Deviant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=426" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Gatewalkers Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=190) pg. 9, [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 100

**Requirements**
You have a free hand.

</column>

---

A directed beam of heat or an arc of lightning is one of the simplest ways to project energy. You fire a blast or beam from one hand. Make an attack roll against a creature within 30 feet. If you succeed, the beam deals 1d6 damage for every 2 levels you have to the target, or double damage on a critical success.
name: Blasting Beams
